Shinsengumi Onitaicho ("The Demon Captain of the
Shinsengumi"), 1854, 119 min, featuring Kataoka
Chiezo, Nakamura Kinnosuke, Tsukigata Ryunosuke and
others. I guess if someone asks momoirousagi about
those actors, most probably she'll know all of them :D

***I listed some old Japanese films I saw and their directors and
momoiro insists that in Japan it is actually difficult to purchase old
films and they aren't shown on TV as much (especially chambara which
fell out of favor a couple of decades ago)....WOW Nakamura Kinnosuke!

- Shinsengumi Shimatsuki ("The Record of the Beginning
and the End of the Shinsengumi"), 1963, 94min,
featuring Ichikawa Raizo as Yamazaki Susumu

***so on Ebay this film is called "Shinsengumi Chronicles" or "I want
to die a samurai"

Serizawa, I'm sorry to hear about your teacher's passing.  You have my
deepest sympathy. Take Care.
